description: Table to track changes to the priority of a transport request.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Transport Request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NEW_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new transport request priority in the audit trail.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stat


High


Normal


Low

columns.name: OLD_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The old transport request priority in the audit trail


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NEW_PRIORITY_C_NAME

columns.name: PRIOR_CHNG_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which a transport request priority was changed.

columns.name: PRIOR_CHNG_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who changed the priority of this transport request.
